summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant U.S. Attorneys regarding scheduling for grand jury presentations on June 26 and July 1, 2008. It mentions two cases: US v. Jonathan E. Clark and an operation called 'Leap Year', indicating witness testimony and indictment plans.

persons.name: Jonathan E. Clark
persons.context: Subject of the indictment case 'US v. Jonathan E. Clark' scheduled for grand jury presentation on June 26, 2008.

events.title: Grand Jury Presentation for US v. Jonathan E. Clark
events.description: Scheduled grand jury presentation for an indictment in the case US v. Jonathan E. Clark, not sealed, with witness testimony to follow.

events.title: Grand Jury Presentation for Operation Leap Year
events.description: Scheduled grand jury presentation for an indictment and witness testimony related to 'Operation Leap Year', which will be sealed.

keyFacts: Grand jury presentations were scheduled for June 26 and July 1, 2008, involving Assistant U.S. Attorneys.
The case US v. Jonathan E. Clark was set for indictment presentation on June 26, 2008, and was not sealed.
An operation called 'Leap Year' was set for indictment and witness testimony on July 1, 2008, and was to be sealed.
The email chain shows coordination between prosecutors regarding the order of witness testimony and indictments.
